mapper.select: SELECT a.NAME AS area_name, h.NAME AS hobby_name, hs.NAME AS hobby_sub_name, c.* FROM ALTO_CLASS c, ALTO_AREA a, ALTO_HOBBY h, ALTO_HOBBY_SUB hs WHERE a.AREA_CODE = c.AREA_CODE AND c.HOBBY_CODE = h.HOBBY_CODE AND c.HOBBY_SUB_CODE = hs.HOBBY_SUB_CODE AND CLASS_CODE = ${class_code}

mapper.select: SELECT C.*, D.NAME area_name, E.NAME hobby_name FROM ( SELECT B.GOODS_CODE CLASS_CODE FROM ALTO_ORDER A, ALTO_ORDER_ITEM B WHERE A.ORDERID = B.ORDERID AND B.GOODS_TYPE = 'class' AND A.MEMBERID = #{mem_id} ) A, ALTO_CLASS C, ALTO_AREA D, ALTO_HOBBY E WHERE A.CLASS_CODE = C.CLASS_CODE AND C.AREA_CODE = D.AREA_CODE AND C.HOBBY_CODE = E.HOBBY_CODE

SELECT A.CLASS_CODE class_code, B.CLASSNAME className, B.HOBBY_CODE hobby_code, D.NAME hobby_name, B.HOBBY_SUB_CODE hobby_sub_code, C.NAME area_name, B.PRICE price, B.IMGNAME imgName FROM ALTO_LIKE A, ALTO_CLASS B, ALTO_AREA C, ALTO_HOBBY D WHERE A.CLASS_CODE = B.CLASS_CODE AND B.AREA_CODE = C.AREA_CODE AND B.HOBBY_CODE = D.HOBBY_CODE AND A.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
